subject:
Registration Deadline for Cronos Sales IM Chat Tool Assembly
 Competition Extended
body:
Hello sm1lies, 

The registration deadline has been extended to 5/12 for the Cronos Sales IM Chat Tool Assembly competition.  The Sales IM tool is an application that will create a web based instant messaging system. The system will be used, installed, and run on a company's web site. The tool will allow potential clients of the company to ask questions and chat with the company.

- First Place Prize: $9,000
- Second Place Prize: $4,500

Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001536

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.

www.topcoder.com

Glastonbury, CT 06033
